about_the_game:
Become a one-of-a-kind angry bird.
It’s time to shake a tail feather and establish a new pecking order in The City. As a chicken that fears no one, you have to break some bad eggs to make an omelet. Use a claw that can cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess. And if someone dares to doubt your ability to fly, prove them wrong by taking it to the skies with a featherweight paraglider.

The bundle contains:
  • Rooster Suit — wear this outfit, and all of your enemies will chicken out when facing you!
  • Chicken Claw — cut, scratch, and slice your foes like the true cocky rooster you are, with a bleeding effect on top of that!
  • Chicken Wing — why did the chicken jump off the roof? Well, to soar through the skies with this new paraglider skin.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Become a one-of-a-kind angry bird.
It’s time to shake a tail feather and establish a new pecking order in The City. As a chicken that fears no one, you have to break some bad eggs to make an omelet. Use a claw that can cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess. And if someone dares to doubt your ability to fly, prove them wrong by taking it to the skies with a featherweight paraglider.

The bundle contains:
  • Rooster Suit — wear this outfit, and all of your enemies will chicken out when facing you!
  • Chicken Claw — cut, scratch, and slice your foes like the true cocky rooster you are, with a bleeding effect on top of that!
  • Chicken Wing — why did the chicken jump off the roof? Well, to soar through the skies with this new paraglider skin.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB or AMD RX Vega 56 8GB or newer
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Establish a new pecking order in The City. Become a chicken that fears no one with the Rooster Suit. Cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess, and soar through the sky, proving to them all that even a chicken can fly!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Arabic, Czech, Japanese*, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
